This version of 3.091 course doesn't provide solutions to the exams, only solutions to the problem sets are available. See the course for more info and materials at: https://ocw.mit.edu/3-091F18. There is an older version of this 3.091 that does have exams with solutions: http://ocw.mit.edu/3-091SCF10. We hope that helps. Best wishes on your studies!
